article_title: Actually, Justice Kennedy, IRS Did Tell Congress Section 36B Contains 'Contradictory Language'

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: The head of the IRS testified to Congress that there is language in the ACA that contradicts government’s argument in King v. Burwell.
